Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab (Job Description):

  • Menyediakan laporan berbasis data (data-driven reports) untuk mendukung pengambilan keputusan bisnis.
  • Mengumpulkan, menganalisis, dan melaporkan data kinerja aktivitas digital marketing.
  • Mengidentifikasi tren dan wawasan dari data untuk mengoptimalkan strategi marketing.
  • Membuat laporan dan visualisasi data yang mudah dipahami.
  • Menggunakan alat analisis data (misalnya, Google Analytics, Excel, SQL) untuk mengolah data.
  • Memantau dan menganalisis KPI (Key Performance Indicators) untuk mengukur efektivitas marketing.
  • Menyajikan hasil analisis data kepada tim marketing dan manajemen.
  • Mengembangkan dan memelihara dasbor data.
  • Melakukan analisis kompetitif dan riset pasar.
  • Mengolah dan menganalisis data untuk memberikan insight bisnis.
  • Melakukan riset pasar untuk mengidentifikasi tren industri dan peluang bisnis.
  • Menyusun dan menyajikan laporan analisis kepada tim terkait.
  • Berkolaborasi dengan divisi marketing, sales dan operasional Perusahaan.
  • Mengelola akses dan keamanan data (data access and security) untuk laporan.

Keahlian (Skill):

  • SQL dan data Visualization tools
  • Power BI
  • Microsoft Excell
  • Google Sheet
  • Google Apps Script, Python
  • Data Analytics dan Statistical Data Analysis

Kualifikasi (Requirements):

  • Pendidikan minimal Diploma/Sarjana di bidang terkait (relevan).
  • Memiliki pengalaman bekerja minimal 1 s.d. 3 tahun dibidang pengolahan dan analis data (lebih diutamakan di bidang digital marketing dan market research).
  • Lancar berbahasa Inggris.
  • Memiliki integritas, loyalitas, pekerja keras, dan fast response.
  • Pengalaman dalam menggunakan alat analisis data (Google Analytics, Excel, SQL, Python).
  • Kemampuan untuk membuat laporan dan visualisasi data yang jelas dan ringkas, dengan Power BI atau Tableau.
  • Memahami statistik, analisis tren, dan machine learning dasar.
  • Kemampuan untuk bekerja dengan data besar dan kompleks.
  • Berpikir analitis, detail-oriented, serta mampu menyajikan data secara logis.
  • Komunikatif & kolaboratif, bisa bekerja sama dengan tim marketing, sales, dan operasional.
  • Kemampuan dalam mengidentifikasi pola dan tren dari data.

Kompensani dan Benefit:

  • Gaji yang kompetitif dengan insentif kinerja.
  • BPJS (Asuransi kesehatan)
  • Kesempatan untuk bertumbuh dan berkembang di perusahaan yang bereputasi baik.

Job Description

  1. Design, develop, and maintain scalable back-end services and APIs using Golang.
  2. Implement and maintain robust security measures to protect data and applications.
  3. Contribute to the overall system architecture and technical direction.
  4. Collaborate with front end engineer, product & project managers, and other engineer teams to deliver seamless integration and end-to-end solutions.
  5. Participate in the entire application lifecycle, focusing on coding and debugging.
  6. Ensure code quality through automated testing, code reviews, and adherence to best practices.
  7. Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
  8. Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems.
  9. Design and manage databases, ensuring data integrity and security.
  10. Manage cutting-edge technologies to improve legacy applications.
  11. Maintain clear and comprehensive documentation of code and systems.

Job Requirements

  1. Graduate from Bachelor, Diploma 3, or Diploma 4 degree from IT, Software Engineering, Computer Science, or other related majors.
  2. Have a minimum 2 years of experience as an Back End Engineer or similar role with proficiency in Go Language (Golang) & frameworks/libraries Go Fiber.
  3. Proven experience in developing high-performance APIs and implementing Microservice Architecture.
  4. Proficiency in version control systems (Git, GitLab) and best practices, including branching mechanisms and pull requests.
  5. Strong experience working with SQL and NoSQL databases, such as PostgreSQL and MongoDB.
  6. Hands-on experience with message brokers like Kafka, RabbitMQ, or Google Pub/Sub.
  7. Familiarity with service-to-service communication protocols such as gRPC.
  8. Experience with containerization and orchestration tools, including Docker and Kubernetes.
  9. Knowledge of cloud platforms and services, such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.
  10. Solid understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and Agile/Scrum methodologies.

Placements (Choose one)

  1. Halim, East Jakarta.
  2. Cilandak, South Jakarta (Alamanda Office Tower 11th Floor).
  3. Umbulharjo, Yogyakarta.

About Us

At S20 Group, we believe in building a future where ideas solve real problems. Our team operates across digital services, startup building, and skills development‚Äîdelivering impactful results to clients through innovation, creativity, and a bit of fun. As we grow, we‚Äôre looking to optimize and automate internal and client-facing workflows to increase efficiency and scale smarter.

Role Overview

We‚Äôre looking for an AI Automation Specialist who thrives on solving operational bottlenecks through smart systems and automations. You'll be the go-to person for identifying repetitive tasks, designing automation workflows, and leveraging tools like Zapier, Make (Integromat), OpenAI, ChatGPT plugins, Google Workspace, and any relevant APIs or AI platforms.

Why Join Us

  • Be part of a team that values creativity, growth, and innovation.
  • Flexible hours and location‚Äîresults matter more than where you work from.
  • Opportunity to grow into a long-term strategic role as our automation systems evolve.

result.job_title: Data Analyst ‚Äì Customer Segmentation & Top Spender Analysis
result.job_description:
Data Analyst ‚Äì Customer Segmentation & Top Spender Analysis

Tugas & Tanggung Jawab:

1. Analisis Segmentasi Pelanggan

A. Klasifikasi Kelas Pelanggan:

  • Mengelompokkan pelanggan berdasarkan kriteria seperti frekuensi pembelian, nilai transaksi (RFM Analysis: Recency, Frequency, Monetary), dan engagement (contoh: klik, wishlist).
  • Membuat segmentasi tier (Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum) atau klasifikasi lain yang relevan.

B. Analisis Domisili Pelanggan:

  • Memetakan distribusi geografis pelanggan (provinsi/kota) dari data TikTok Shop dan Shopee.
  • Mengidentifikasi daerah dengan pertumbuhan pelanggan tertinggi dan potensi ekspansi pasar.

2. Merancang Program Top Spender

A. Identifikasi Top Spender:

  • Membuat algoritma/program (menggunakan Python/SQL) untuk menentukan top spender bulanan dan tahunan berdasarkan total pembelian, frekuensi, dan loyalitas.
  • Memantau pergerakan top spender antar-waktu dan menganalisis faktor penyebab perubahan.

B. Pelaporan & Rekomendasi:

  • Menyusun laporan otomatis (via Google Sheets/Tableau) daftar top spender beserta insight perilaku belanja mereka.
  • Memberikan rekomendasi program loyalitas atau promo eksklusif untuk top spender (contoh: cashback, early access sale).

3. Analisis Data & Pemodelan

A. Data Processing:

  • Mengolah data transaksi, demografi, dan logistik dari TikTok Shop & Shopee (cleaning, transformasi, enrichment).

B. Predictive Modeling:

  • Membuat model prediktif (misal: clustering dengan K-Means, regresi) untuk mengidentifikasi pelanggan berpotensi menjadi top spender.
  • Analisis cohort untuk memahami retensi pelanggan di tiap segmen.

4. Kolaborasi & Implementasi

A. Bekerja dengan tim marketing untuk:

  • Merancang kampanye berbasis segmentasi (contoh: promo khusus wilayah tertentu).
  • Mengoptimalkan target iklan untuk top spender dan pelanggan potensial.

B. Berkoordinasi dengan tim CRM untuk personalisasi komunikasi (email/notifikasi).

Kualifikasi:

A. Teknis:

  • Mahir SQL (query kompleks, agregasi) dan Python/R (Pandas, Scikit-learn untuk clustering).
  • Pengalaman dengan tools visualisasi (Tableau/Power BI) dan Google Sheets/Excel (formula lanjutan).
  • Familiar dengan dataset TikTok Shop (Seller Center) dan Shopee (Shopee Open API/Data Hub).

B. Non-Teknis:

- Kemampuan komunikasi untuk menyampaikan insight ke tim non-teknis.

- Pemahaman tentang strategi CRM dan loyalitas pelanggan di e-commerce.

Tools yang Digunakan:

  1. Analisis Data: Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn), SQL (BigQuery/PostgreSQL).
  2. Visualisasi: Tableau/Power BI (untuk dashboard segmentasi & top spender).
  3. Otomatisasi: Google Apps Script/Excel Macro (opsional untuk laporan rutin).

Catatan:

Hasil analisis harus actionable (contoh: rekomendasi promo "Free Ongkir untuk Tier Gold ke atas di Jawa Barat").

Program top spender dapat dikembangkan jadi sistem real-time monitoring jika diperlukan.

Contoh output yang diharapkan:

1. Dashboard Segmentasi Pelanggan (Domisili + Tier).

2. Daftar Top Spender Bulanan/Tahunan* + Riwayat Transaksi.

3. Laporan Analisis Perilaku Top Spender (produk favorit, waktu belanja, dll.).

Are you an experienced Full Stack Developer looking for a new challenge? We have an exciting opportunity for a Full Stack Developer to join our team. Job Description:

Slush Digital, a Bali-based digital agency, is looking for a skilled and detail-oriented Front-End Developer with strong experience in e-commerce platforms to join our team. This role will focus on building and optimising e-commerce websites using Shopify and WordPress/WooCommerce. The ideal candidate will have a sharp eye for design execution, excellent technical knowledge, and a solid understanding of how to deliver high-conversion, seamless shopping experiences.

Key Responsibilities:

‚Ä¢ Website Development: Build and maintain custom front-end themes for e-commerce websites, and utilise high-performing existing Shopify themes where appropriate.

‚Ä¢ Responsive Design Implementation: Ensure responsive and cross-browser-compatible development to deliver seamless user experiences across all devices.

‚Ä¢ 3rd Party Integration: Set up and configure third-party apps, plugins, and APIs, including payment gateways on WooCommerce (experience with Doku or similar is preferred).

‚Ä¢ Performance Optimisation: Optimise front-end performance to ensure fast load times, SEO readiness, and smooth customer interactions.

‚Ä¢ Collaboration: Work closely with designers, back-end developers, and project managers to implement creative and functional designs that meet client expectations.

‚Ä¢ Troubleshooting: Identify and resolve front-end issues related to site performance, design inconsistencies, and integration problems.

‚Ä¢ Technology Awareness: Stay up to date with the latest trends, updates, and best practices in e-commerce development, including platform changes and performance tools.

Requirements:

‚Ä¢ Platform Experience: Proven experience developing websites using Shopify and WordPress/WooCommerce.

‚Ä¢ E-Commerce Knowledge: Strong understanding of e-commerce best practices, including user experience (UX) and conversion optimisation.

‚Ä¢ Technical Proficiency: Solid skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Liquid (for Shopify), and experience with popular page builders such as Elementor.

‚Ä¢ Plugin & App Integration: Experience installing and configuring third-party payment gateways and shipping plugins, particularly for WooCommerce. Experience with Doku is a plus.

‚Ä¢ CMS Customisation: Comfortable working with theme customisation, child themes, and basic back-end structures in WordPress.

‚Ä¢ Problem Solving: Strong analytical and troubleshooting abilities with a proactive approach to debugging and optimisation.

‚Ä¢ Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills in both Bahasa Indonesia and English. Comfortable liaising with internal teams across multiple departments.

‚Ä¢ Collaboration: Ability to work effectively within a team, communicate clearly, and take ownership of assigned tasks.

Preferred Skills:

‚Ä¢ Experience with headless CMS or Shopify Hydrogen.

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with SEO principles related to front-end implementation.

‚Ä¢ Basic understanding of back-end development (PHP/WordPress).

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with version control systems like Git.

‚Ä¢ Experience with e-commerce product customizer/mockup software.

Why Join Us?

‚Ä¢ Work on exciting e-commerce projects across various industries and international markets.

‚Ä¢ Collaborate with a passionate and skilled digital team.

‚Ä¢ Flexible, creative environment with opportunities for growth.

‚Ä¢ Access to the latest tools, technologies, and learning resources.

‚Ä¢ Be part of a fast-paced agency where your contributions make a real impact.

Application Details:

Please submit your CV and portfolio of e-commerce projects you‚Äôve worked on. Highlight your experience with Shopify, WordPress/WooCommerce, and any notable plugin or payment gateway integrations you‚Äôve handled.

We look forward to finding a proactive and skilled developer to join our growing team!

We are seeking a talented and experienced System Analyst to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for analyzing, designing, and implementing our enterprise-wide ERP system. You will collaborate with various stakeholders to understand business requirements, translate them into technical specifications, and ensure the successful integration and utilization of the ERP system. If you have a strong understanding of ERP systems, excellent analytical skills, and a passion for optimizing business processes, we would like to hear from you.

Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with business users, stakeholders, and IT teams to gather and document functional and technical requirements for the ERP system.
  • Analyze existing business processes and identify areas for improvement, ensuring alignment with industry best practices and organizational goals.
  • Design and configure the ERP system to meet specific business needs, including customizations, workflows, and integrations with other systems.
  • Work closely with ERP implementation teams to oversee system installation, testing, and training activities.
  • Develop and maintain system documentation, including process flows, data models, and system configurations.
  • Provide ongoing support and troubleshooting for the ERP system, identifying and resolving issues in a timely manner.
  • Conduct regular system audits to ensure data integrity, security, and compliance with regulatory requirements.
  • Stay updated with the latest trends and developments in ERP systems and technology, and make recommendations for system enhancements and optimizations.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.
  • Proven experience as a System Analyst, preferably with hands-on experience in implementing and supporting ERP systems.
  • Strong understanding of ERP concepts, modules, and functionality (e.g., finance, supply chain, manufacturing, HR).
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
  • Strong project management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks, manage timelines, and coordinate with cross-functional teams.
  • Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively collaborate with stakeholders at all levels.
  • Join our dynamic team and contribute to the successful implementation and optimization of our ERP system. Apply now with your updated resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience.

The Opportunity:

  • You love solving problems and building creative and effective solutions.
  • You want to learn and develop new skills, especially in the areas of Robotic Process Automation (RPA), data processing/ETL, data/web scraping and software testing.
  • You want to see your work bring immediate benefits and impact.
  • You are passionate, analytical and a team player.

Your day-to-day work at Kalyana Solutions:

  • You will work in a cross-functional team to bring a wide variety of automation ideas to life using Robotic Process Automation (RPA).
  • Work alongside our awesome team of Project Managers, Business Analysts, Solution Architects and other Software Engineers.
  • Build robust, maintaineable and scaleable automations using C# / VB.NET. These automations work in a wide variety of scenarios, interacting with desktop/web applications, APIs and various other data sources. You will build a mix of background/unattended processes and "lite" desktop-app-like experiences for attended execution.
  • Build reusable code and libraries to be shared across multiple projects.
  • Design data storage / processing schemas and pipelines.
  • Maintain up-to-date and complete project documentation.
  • Communicate regularly with our team and our customers.
  • Work with our team members to ensure that business/functional, technical and security requirements are met.

Requirements

  • 1-3 years of relevant experience in Software Engineering. We are looking for previous experience with Desktop/Web applications and/or Testing technologies
  • Proficiency in a programming language used in any of the above areas.
  • Proficiency in C# or VB.NET is desirable.
  • Existing experience with RPA tools (UiPath, Automation Anywhere, etc.) is desirable.
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving, teamwork and communication skills.
  • Working knowledge of software architecture and design.
  • Proficiency in code versioning tools such as Git, Subversion, Mercurial, TFS. Familiar with code review and deployment workflow using GitHub/GitLab.

We are offering an exciting internship opportunity for students currently studying in the fields of Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related disciplines, who are eager to gain hands-on experience in full-stack development. As a Full-Stack Development Intern, you will assist in the development of a design plugin, gaining practical experience in both front-end and back-end development. You will work closely with our development team to design, build, and test the plugin, ensuring it meets functionality, user experience, and performance standards. Your tasks will include collaborating on UI/UX design, coding the front-end interface, integrating it with the back-end logic, and assisting with database management. Additionally, you will help with bug fixing, conducting tests, and learning how to improve the plugin‚Äôs scalability and compatibility with different design platforms. This unpaid internship is a great opportunity to learn about full-stack development in a real-world context while contributing to an exciting project. The ideal candidate should have a solid foundation in web development technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and knowledge of back-end technologies such as Node.js, Python, or similar frameworks. Experience with databases (SQL or NoSQL) and version control tools (such as Git) is a plus, but not required. This position is perfect for students who are passionate about coding, eager to learn, and looking to expand their portfolios by contributing to a real-world project. Job Summary:

The DevOps Engineer will be responsible for managing infrastructure, automating deployments, monitoring system performance, and ensuring high availability of the HR application. The role involves close collaboration with development, QA, and operations teams to streamline processes and optimize the CI/CD pipeline for a smooth release cycle.

Key Responsibilities:

1). Infrastructure Management:

  • Design, implement, and maintain cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, GCP).
  • Optimize performance, scalability, and reliability for a high-availability HR application.
  • Manage containerization platforms like Docker and Kubernetes for deployment and scaling.

2). CI/CD Pipeline:

  • Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines for automating deployments (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI).
  • Ensure rapid and reliable code integration, testing, and deployment processes.
  • Continuously improve the release process by automating manual tasks and integrating tools for monitoring and reporting.

3). Monitoring and Security:

  • Implement and manage monitoring tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack) to ensure application performance and uptime.
  • Proactively address system incidents, troubleshoot issues, and escalate when necessary.
  • Manage security configurations, monitor for vulnerabilities, and ensure compliance with security best practices.
  • Implement backups, disaster recovery plans, and failover mechanisms to ensure data integrity and system continuity.

4). Collaboration with Development and Operations:

  • Work closely with the development team to support the software development lifecycle.
  • Collaborate with the operations team to streamline release processes, test environments, and system stability.
  • Provide guidance on infrastructure and tooling to support new HR system features or services.

5). Automation and Optimization:

  • Automate infrastructure provisioning using Infrastructure-as-Code tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation, Ansible).
  • Identify bottlenecks and optimize resource utilization to reduce operational costs.
  • Work on performance tuning, load balancing, and application scaling to meet user demand.

6). Database and Storage:

  • Manage database clusters (SQL/NoSQL) and ensure data redundancy, replication, and backup policies.
  • Monitor database performance and ensure high availability of critical HR-related data.

7). Compliance and Audit:

  • Ensure compliance with industry standards (e.g., GDPR for handling employee data).
  • Prepare and assist in audits by maintaining proper logs, backups, and disaster recovery plans.

Required Skills and Qualifications:

Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

Experience:

  • Proven experience in managing infrastructure for SaaS applications, preferably HR or similar business-critical applications.
  • Experience in cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) with hands-on expertise in scaling and optimizing cloud-based infrastructure.
  • Solid knowledge of containerization technologies like Docker and orchestration with Kubernetes.
  • Strong background in automation, scripting (Bash, Python, etc.), and Infrastructure-as-Code (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation).

Tools & Technologies:

  • CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab, CircleCI)
  • Configuration management (Ansible, Chef, Puppet)
  • Monitoring (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, Datadog)
  • Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
  • Version control (Git)
  • Database management (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)

Security:

  • Experience with securing cloud infrastructure, ensuring data encryption, and managing access controls.
  • Understanding of compliance requirements, especially GDPR or other employee data protection laws.

Soft Skills:

  • Strong communication skills for working across departments.
  • Problem-solving and analytical skills to quickly diagnose and resolve issues.
  • A proactive approach to managing infrastructure and anticipating potential issues.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience in managing infrastructure for HR applications or related business-critical software.
  • Understanding of HR systems and also our product, payroll, employee data management, and other HR-specific workflows.
  • Familiarity with regulatory compliance and data privacy in HR applications.

About SuperFood:

SuperFood is at the forefront of food-tech innovation, delivering groundbreaking solutions. We are seeking a talented DevOps Engineer to join our dynamic team and contribute to the development of cutting-edge applications and systems.

Job Overview:

Join our team as a DevOps Engineer to streamline our CI/CD pipelines, manage cloud infrastructure, and ensure high system availability. You‚Äôll work closely with development teams, handle product deployment, application monitoring, domain and SSL certificate renewals, and oversee disaster recovery and on-call duties.

Job Descriptions

SoftwareSeni is a Software Development Company based in Yogyakarta & Sydney, Australia. We have been designing and developing phone apps, websites, and mobile experiences. We love solving tough problems ‚Äì from user experience to design and code.

We build enterprise web-based solutions for clients all over the world, from Australia, Indonesia, Europe, Africa, and America. Our clients from Indonesia: Astra International, Traveloka, Angkasa Pura, Peduli Anak Foundation. Our clients from Australia: Bike Exchange, Downsizing, Red Balloon, Sectara, and many more.


What will you get?

  • Competitive Salary. We believe that salary is one of the main factors that keep the employee in the company, therefore we can guarantee a competitive salary for our Staff.
  • Career Development & Training. We have a wonderful onboarding process where we help new team members get familiar with how we work. 
  • Reasonable & Flexible Schedules. We are encouraging a culture where people can have a good work-life balance. Our schedules are pretty flexible. Need to run an errand in the middle of the day? Totally cool. 
  • English Class. Working in SoftwareSeni means that you would get massive improvement in your English, both spoken and written guarantee!
  • Annual Leave entitlement. 12 working days which can be taken after 3 months of joining.

  • Relocation Allowance. We provide a relocation allowance if you do not live in Yogyakarta. The allowance will cover moving costs for you and your family.
  • Staff Engagement Activities. We provide fun icebreaker activities in the middle of our working hours to chill and build relationships with all the staff. Sounds fun, right?
  • Birthday Leave. We also want to celebrate our staff's happiest day by giving them half-day leave on their birthday.

Job Summary

The Business Systems Analyst is responsible for the evaluation of company's business systems, identification and mapping of business system requirements, and the development of strategies for business system enhancements and rationalization.

This is a 3-6 months contract placement with the potential to be permanent. Immediate availability is a plus!

Key Responsibilities

  • Conduct system analysis to understand current functionalities and limitations.
  • Work with stakeholders to gather requirements and identify business system improvement opportunities.
  • Conduct interviews, surveys, and workshops to obtain business and technical requirements.
  • Evaluate alternative solutions and technologies to meet business objectives.
  • Develop and manage project plans for business system migrations and implementations and ensure they are completed on time, within scope, and within budget.
  • Facilitate communication between technical teams and business units.
  • Ensure that business system changes are implemented with minimal disruption to operations.
  • Provide training and support to users on new business systems and processes.
  • Document all business system migrations, modifications, and (new) business system specifications.
  • Research, develop and propose solutions to address business needs and improve processes.

Qualifications

  • Proven experience as a Business Systems Analyst or similar role.
  • Strong understanding of business processes and system development life cycle.
  • Experience with business system migrations and implementing IT solutions.
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Strong project management skills and experience.
  • Proficient in data analysis and making data-driven recommendations.
  • Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.

About Us

Intage Indonesia is a pioneer in market research and consumer insights, empowering businesses across Southeast Asia with data-driven strategies. We cutting-edge technology to deliver actionable intelligence. Join our team and lead the transformation of raw data into impactful business solutions!

Job Description

We are seeking a meticulous Data Processing Manager to oversee data operations for our market research projects. You will ensure the accuracy, efficiency, and security of data workflows while leading a team of specialists. Expertise in SurveyToGo/Dooblo is essential, and familiarity with Lyche and QPSMR will be a strong advantage.

Key Responsibilities

  • Questionnaire Development: Design, script, and optimize SurveyToGo/Dooblo-based questionnaires to ensure clarity, logical flow, and alignment with research objectives. Collaborate with research teams to refine questions for data accuracy and respondent engagement.
  • Team Leadership & Mentorship: Manage, train, and mentor a team of data processors and junior analysts, fostering expertise in questionnaire scripting, data cleaning, and tool proficiency (e.g., SurveyToGo, QPSMR).
  • Data Management: Supervise end-to-end data processing, including collection, cleaning, validation, and transformation of survey data from diverse sources.
  • Tool Expertise: Master SurveyToGo/Dooblo for survey programming and data extraction; troubleshoot and optimize workflows.
  • Quality Control: Implement strict validation protocols to ensure error-free, client-ready deliverables.
  • Compliance: Ensure adherence to data privacy laws (GDPR, CCPA, Indonesia PDPA) and internal security standards.
  • Collaboration: Partner with research, analytics, and client teams to align outputs with project goals and deadlines.
  • Process Improvement: Automate repetitive tasks using scripting tools (Python, SQL, or R) to enhance scalability would be an advantage
  • Reporting: Develop dashboards and summaries to highlight insights and data anomalies for stakeholders would be an advantage.

Requirements

Essential:

  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or related field.
  • 5+ years of data processing experience, including 2+ years in a supervisory role.
  • Proficiency in SurveyToGo/Dooblo for survey design and data management.
  • Strong skills in statistical software (SPSS, SAS) and scripting languages (Python/R).
  • Excellent organizational, communication, and project management abilities.

Preferred:

  • Experience with QPSMR software for data tabulation and reporting.
  • Familiarity with BI tools (Tableau, Power BI) or cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud).
  • Background in market research or consumer insights.
  • Knowledge of AI/ML applications in data processing.

What We Offer

  • Competitive salary with performance incentives.
  • Health insurance, retirement plans, and wellness programs.
  • Professional development opportunities and certifications.
  • Flexible work arrangements (hybrid/remote).
  • A culture of innovation and collaboration.

How to Apply

Submit your resume and a brief cover letter highlighting your experience with SurveyToGo or any other data collection program by 17 April 2025.

Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.

About Us

Intage Indonesia is a pioneer in market research and consumer insights, empowering businesses across Southeast Asia with data-driven strategies. We leverage cutting-edge technology to deliver actionable intelligence. Join our team and contribute to transforming raw data into impactful business solutions!

Job Description

We are seeking a detail-oriented Data Processing Executive to support the end-to-end processing of market research data. In this role, you will assist in questionnaire scripting, data cleaning, validation, and reporting under the guidance of the Data Processing Manager. Proficiency in SurveyToGo/Dooblo is required, and familiarity with Lyche or QPSMR will be a strong advantage.

Key Responsibilities

  • Questionnaire Support: Assist in scripting and testing SurveyToGo/Dooblo-based questionnaires, ensuring alignment with research objectives and respondent usability.
  • Data Handling: Execute data collection, cleaning, validation, and transformation tasks from surveys, focus groups, and digital sources.
  • Quality Assurance: Conduct routine checks to identify and resolve data inconsistencies or errors, ensuring accuracy for client deliverables.
  • Tool Utilization: Use SurveyToGo/Dooblo for survey programming, data extraction, and basic troubleshooting. Support Lyche or QPSMR workflows as needed.
  • Compliance: Follow data privacy regulations (GDPR, Indonesia PDPA) and internal security protocols.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with the Data Processing Manager and cross-functional teams to meet project deadlines.
  • Documentation: Maintain clear records of data workflows, issues, and resolutions.
  • Reporting Assistance: Support the creation of dashboards and summaries to highlight key insights for stakeholders.

---

Requirements

Essential:

- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Data Science, Statistics, Social Sciences, or a related field.

- 1‚Äì3 years of experience in data processing, preferably in market research

- Fresh graduate from related field is welcomed.

- Proficiency in SurveyToGo/Dooblo for survey scripting and data handling.

- Basic knowledge of statistical software (SPSS, Excel) and data validation techniques.

- Strong attention to detail, organizational skills, and problem-solving abilities.

- Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

Preferred:

- Familiarity with Lyche or QPSMR for data tabulation and reporting.

- Exposure to scripting tools (Python, SQL, R) for automation tasks.

- Basic understanding of BI tools (Tableau, Power BI).

- Interest in learning AI/ML applications in data processing.

What We Offer

- Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.

- Health insurance, retirement plans, and wellness programs.

- Opportunities for skill development and career growth into advanced roles.

- Flexible hybrid work arrangements.

- A supportive, collaborative team environment.

Bali Children Foundation (BCF): Education to Employment

Starting in 2002, BCF has worked one village at a time to help poor, remote or disaster-impacted villages. After identifying a village with disadvantaged families, our local staff members work together with the village leaders to introduce families to BCF and the opportunities our scholarships and curriculum provide.

Our vision is for disadvantaged communities in Bali and nearby islands to become socially, economically and culturally empowered through the pathway of education to employment. Our mission is to improve the education standards for children living in disadvantaged regions of Bali and nearby islands so that they can achieve better incomes for themselves, their families and broader communities.

BCF‚Äôs work to provide quality education in remote government SDN schools includes the provision of curriculum, some direct teaching and extensive teacher training across schools in Bali, Lombok and West Sumba.

Key Responsibilities:

Data Management

‚óè Maintain and organize database entry and enrolment with teachers and students on iEDU Center, in conjunction with Education Admin who does the data entry.

‚óè Check and evaluate weekly students‚Äô attendance and scores in 60+ schools per curriculum.

‚óè Manage database including associated Google Sheets, KOBOToolbox, iEDU, reporting criteria and curriculum.

‚óè Generate monthly teacher salary budgets and report it to Admin Lead for approval.

‚óè Monitor test score input and scheduling.

‚óè Audit testing score to ensure accuracy during the review process.

‚óè Prepare weekly and quarterly reports in cooperation with all teams. Ensure reports are accurate and are submitted on time.

‚óè Provide analysis on data, data storage, extraction and showcase, etc.

‚óè Recommend uses of data for donors and charity direction.

‚óè Create related SOPs on data management of all curriculum and testing in conjunction with related Education Department staff members, and sponsorship in conjunction with Scholarships Department staff members.

Monitoring and Evaluation

‚óè Develop and implement monitoring and evaluation systems to track program progress and impact.

‚óè Develop and implement school and office assets monitoring systems, which need to be updated and followed-up by the teachers, the teacher trainers, and Data and Admin Support on an ongoing basis.

‚óè Review existing assessment tools for Education and Youth programs.

‚óè Collect and analyse assessment data for Education and Youth programs to ensure effectiveness of the programs.

‚óè Produce reports on Education and Youth program performance and impact that work seamlessly with the existing reporting.

‚óè Enhance statistical analysis skills. Stay up-to-date on the latest best practices in data management in Indonesia and internationally, including through technology.

Others

‚óè Provide necessary monthly donor reports by referring to the collected field data, in conjunction with the department leads, for fundraising purposes.

‚óè Travel to the fields to support Education, Youth, and Fundraising/Communication departments, as necessary.

‚óè The job description relates to BCF education plans for 2025. As BCF moves to its next four-year planning to 2028 and designs Move East projects, job descriptions for all team members will be adjusted to ensure maximum benefits for Indonesian children‚Äôs education.

Job Description:

The System Analyst will be responsible for evaluating and improving IT systems for the organization. This role involves gathering business requirements, analyzing system performance, and recommending solutions that optimize business processes. The ideal candidate will work closely with stakeholders to define system requirements and collaborate with developers and IT teams to ensure solutions are implemented effectively.

Conduct needs analysis and gather requirements from users to define system specifications.

Analyze current systems and business processes to identify opportunities for improvement.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams (development, operations, stakeholders) to ensure system solutions meet business requirements.

Perform system testing and troubleshooting to ensure all functions are working correctly.

Develop and maintain documentation for system processes, configurations, and updates.

Monitor system performance and recommend enhancements for continuous improvement.

Ensure that systems meet security standards and compliance requirements.

Prepare reports and presentations on system performance and improvement projects.

Job Overview

The Backup System Engineer will be responsible for designing, implementing, managing, and troubleshooting backup solutions for clients across various industries. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with Veritas, Veeam backup software and disaster recovery processes, and will play a critical role in ensuring the availability, integrity, and security of client data through efficient and scalable backup strategies.

Key Responsibilities

Implementation and Configuration:

Install, configure, and maintain Veritas NetBackup and other backup products to meet client needs.

Design and deploy efficient backup architectures, optimizing performance and minimizing data loss risk.

Configure backup schedules, retention policies, and storage targets to ensure a reliable and efficient backup process.

Backup and Disaster Recovery Solutions:

Develop and implement disaster recovery plans (DRPs) to ensure rapid data recovery with minimal downtime.

Perform regular disaster recovery (DR) tests and validate backup restoration procedures.

Ensure that backup and recovery strategies meet the client‚Äôs recovery point objectives (RPO) and recovery time objectives (RTO).

Monitoring and Troubleshooting Backup Systems:

Continuously monitor the health of Veritas NetBackup and other backup systems, ensuring backups run successfully without errors.

Respond to backup failures, troubleshoot root causes, and resolve issues related to backup processes, storage, and network configurations.

Perform proactive maintenance to avoid failures, and work with clients to resolve backup-related issues promptly.

Backup Security and Compliance:

Ensure all backup solutions are compliant with industry regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS) and organizational security standards.

Implement encryption for backup data both in transit and at rest, ensuring the highest levels of security.

Conduct regular security audits and ensure proper backup system configurations to avoid data breaches or security vulnerabilities.

Data Restoration and Recovery:

Oversee data restoration operations, ensuring data is recovered in accordance with client expectations and disaster recovery plans.

Provide guidance and hands-on support for client data recovery requests, ensuring data integrity and quick restoration times.

Document and report on restore procedures and ensure the accuracy and reliability of recovery solutions.

Client Consultation and Support:

Serve as a technical consultant to clients, helping them design and optimize backup and disaster recovery strategies based on their specific business needs.

Work with clients to understand their data protection needs and recommend Veritas-based solutions to meet those requirements.

Provide training and documentation to clients on Veritas backup and recovery solutions, policies, and best practices.

Documentation and Reporting:

Maintain clear and concise documentation of backup configurations, procedures, recovery strategies, and system health reports.

Provide regular status reports to clients on backup performance, issues, and improvements.

Create runbooks, troubleshooting guides, and knowledge base articles to streamline backup operations and incident resolution.

System Optimization and Performance Tuning:

Optimize backup performance by managing storage resources, implementing deduplication, compression, and other optimization features of Veritas NetBackup.

Evaluate and recommend new tools or techniques to improve backup and recovery performance.

Continuously review backup jobs and policies to identify areas for efficiency improvements and cost reduction.

Software Updates and Patch Management:

Stay up to date with the latest releases, patches, and updates for Veritas NetBackup and related backup solutions.

Plan and execute software upgrades and patching to ensure the backup environment remains secure and fully functional.

Key Requirements

Education:

Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent professional experience.

Experience:

2+ years of hands-on experience with Veritas NetBackup and other backup products, specifically in a system engineering or administration role.

Experience in implementing, managing, and troubleshooting enterprise-level backup and disaster recovery systems.

Proven experience with backup and recovery methodologies, storage management, and disaster recovery planning.

Technical Skills:

Deep understanding of Veritas NetBackup architecture, installation, configuration, and management.

Experience with backup-to-disk, backup-to-tape, cloud storage, and hybrid backup solutions.

Strong knowledge of storage solutions, networking, and virtualization technologies (e.g., VMware, Hyper-V).

Familiarity with cloud backup solutions (e.g., Veritas Cloud, AWS, Azure) and deduplication technologies.

Expertise in data encryption, backup security protocols, and disaster recovery best practices.

Familiarity with Linux and Windows Server environments as they relate to backup solutions.

Certifications (Preferred):

Veritas NetBackup Certified Professional (VCP) or equivalent Veritas certifications.

Other relevant certifications such as Veeam Certified Engineer, Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA), or Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP

result.job_title: Red Team Technology Researcher (Offensive Security Focus)

About Our Client:

Our client is an Indonesian consultancy offering tax and legal services to a diverse range of clients. With experienced consultants, they provide comprehensive solutions with a focus on quality and confidentiality. Their client-centric approach aims to be the preferred service provider through personalized and committed service delivery.

Job Brief:

Our client is looking for a Full Stack Developer to design and implement AI-driven applications supporting their tax consulting services. This is an Individual Contributor role, collaborating directly with business stakeholders to build AI solutions for the firm and further develop internal applications. While the AI is developed using prompt scripts, the candidate must have a strong background in Python and Java programming to customize and optimize solutions. The role involves building and managing both backend and frontend systems, with a focus on cloud-based environments.

Job Description:

- Design, develop, and maintain full-stack web applications for the backend and modern frontend frameworks.

- Implement and integrate AI solutions using prompt scripts, including Large Language Models (LLM) and AI modules, into tax consulting services and internal applications.

- Build and manage RESTful APIs or GraphQL for efficient data exchange between internal and external systems.

- Collaborate directly with business stakeholders to gather requirements and deliver technical solutions.

- Work independently as an Individual Contributor to deliver scalable, high-performance solutions in a cloud-based environment.

- Ensure code quality through testing, code reviews, and following best development practices.

- Troubleshoot and debug technical issues to ensure smooth and efficient application performance.

- Provide clear and comprehensive technical documentation for ongoing development and maintenance.

Job Requirements:

- 1+ year of experience as a Full Stack Developer.

- Experience in frontend development using modern frameworks (React, Angular, or Vue).

- Proficiency in Python and Java for AI implementation and internal application development.

- Familiarity with Large Language Models (LLM) and AI module integration.

- Experience working with relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and non-relational databases (MongoDB, Redis).

- Ability to design and develop RESTful APIs or GraphQL.

- Experience in cloud-based environments (AWS, GCP, or Azure).

- Proficiency in version control systems such as Git.

- Preference for candidates with experience in the finance industry.

- Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently.

- Gender-neutral (Male/Female), and English proficiency is not required.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan:

Sebagai Database Administrator (DBA), Anda akan bertanggung jawab untuk mengelola, memelihara, dan memastikan kinerja optimal dari database perusahaan. Anda akan bekerja erat dengan tim pengembang dan tim IT lainnya untuk menjaga keamanan, integritas, dan ketersediaan data dalam lingkungan produksi. Jika Anda memiliki keahlian dalam administrasi database serta kemampuan analitis yang kuat, kami ingin bertemu dengan Anda!

Responsibilities:

  • Mengelola dan memelihara sistem manajemen basis data (DBMS) seperti SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, atau MongoDB.
  • Melakukan backup dan recovery database untuk memastikan data tetap aman dan dapat dipulihkan.
  • Mengoptimalkan kinerja database melalui query tuning, indeks, dan memory management.
  • Mengelola keamanan database termasuk enkripsi, kontrol akses, dan manajemen izin.
  • Mengembangkan dan mengotomatisasi tugas-tugas administrasi database menggunakan scripting (PowerShell, Bash, atau Python).
  • Menerapkan strategi replikasi dan pemulihan bencana untuk menjaga ketersediaan data.
  • Melakukan patching dan upgrade perangkat lunak database sesuai dengan kebutuhan.
  • Berkolaborasi dengan tim pengembang dan tim IT lainnya untuk memastikan integrasi database yang efisien.
  • Mendokumentasikan konfigurasi sistem, prosedur backup, dan rencana pemulihan bencana.

Kualifikasi:

  • Gelar Sarjana dalam bidang Teknologi Informasi, Ilmu Komputer, Sistem Informasi, atau bidang terkait.
  • Pengalaman minimal 1-3 tahun dalam administrasi database, terutama dalam lingkungan produksi.
  • Pengalaman dalam menangani high availability dan disaster recovery sangat dihargai.
  • Kemampuan analitis yang kuat untuk menganalisis kebutuhan sistem dan melakukan troubleshooting masalah database.
  • Keterampilan komunikasi yang baik untuk berkolaborasi dengan tim pengembang dan manajer.
  • Mampu bekerja secara mandiri maupun dalam tim serta memiliki kemampuan manajemen waktu yang baik.

Keahlian Teknis yang Dibutuhkan:

  • Kemampuan menulis dan mengoptimalkan query SQL.
  • Pengalaman dengan sistem manajemen basis data seperti SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, atau MongoDB.
  • Pengetahuan dalam backup, recovery, tuning, dan optimasi kinerja database.
  • Pemahaman mendalam tentang keamanan database, enkripsi, dan kontrol akses.
  • Pengalaman dalam mengelola database di cloud seperti Azure SQL Database, Amazon RDS, atau Google Cloud SQL.
  • Familiar dengan scripting untuk automasi (PowerShell, Bash, atau Python).

Sertifikasi (Opsional):

Sertifikasi berikut akan menjadi nilai tambah:

  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Database Administrator Associate
  • Oracle Certified Professional (OCP)
  • AWS Certified Database ‚Äì Specialty
  • IBM Certified Database Administrator
  • MySQL Database Administrator (DBA) Certification

Keamanan & Kepatuhan:

  • Memahami standar keamanan data seperti GDPR, HIPAA, atau PCI DSS.
  • Mengelola auditing, enkripsi data, dan kepatuhan terhadap regulasi pemerintah serta industri.

Jika Anda memenuhi kualifikasi di atas dan tertarik, silahkan lamar dengan mencantumkan CV, Ijazah, Transkrip Nilai dan Hasil MCU (Jika ada)

Job Description:

Job Description:
We are looking for a passionate and innovative AI Engineer to join our dynamic team in Jakarta. As an AI Engineer, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and integrating cutting-edge AI-powered solutions that directly impact our business operations and customer experiences. The ideal candidate is someone who is eager to learn, highly curious, and has a foundational understanding of Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies, including Large Language Models (LLMs) and other advanced AI models.

You will be responsible for building and fine-tuning AI applications such as chatbots, image and video generators, and social media reporting tools. These solutions will leverage data from library databases and relevant internet sources, and will be seamlessly integrated into existing systems to boost operational efficiency and innovation.

Whether you are a fresh graduate with a strong passion for AI or have some hands-on experience in AI projects, we want to hear from you. Our team values creativity, collaboration, and continuous learning.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and fine-tune AI models using pre-trained models and custom architectures to meet project needs, including chatbots, image/video generators, and social media reporting tools.
  • Integrate AI solutions seamlessly into existing systems and platforms by developing and maintaining APIs (RESTful/GraphQL).
  • Implement ML-Ops best practices for continuous integration, deployment, and monitoring of AI models.
  • Work closely with technical and non-technical teams to understand business requirements and translate them into scalable AI solutions.
  • Experiment with and implement advanced AI techniques such as Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), NLP, and embeddings to enhance solution effectiveness.
  • Collaborate with backend and frontend teams to embed AI functionalities into applications and digital platforms.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest AI advancements and apply new techniques to improve performance and scalability.
  • Maintain comprehensive documentation of models, processes, and integration techniques.
  • Communicate technical concepts clearly to stakeholders and provide regular updates on project progress.

Qualifications:

  • Education: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or related fields.
  • 1-2 years of experience in AI integration, AI application development, or related fields.
  • Fresh graduates with strong enthusiasm for AI and relevant project experience are encouraged to apply.
  • Technical Skills:
    • Proficiency in Python R, or JavaScript.
    • Basic knowledge of data processing and database management (SQL, NoSQL).
    • Experience with AI frameworks and libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Hugging Face, scikit-learn.
    • Experience in developing and fine-tuning AI models, including chatbots and image/video processing.
    • Familiarity with RAG systems, NLP, and embedding techniques.
    • Solid understanding of machine learning techniques, including supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning, natural language processing, and/or reinforcement learning.
    • Knowledge of OCR and computer vision tools (e.g., OpenCV, Tesseract, EasyOCR).
    • Experience with API development (RESTful/GraphQL) and microservices architecture.
    • Understanding of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and ML-Ops practices.
  • Soft Skills:
    • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills with attention to detail.
    • Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.
    • Eager to learn, adaptive to new technologies, and proactive in exploring innovative solutions.
    • Ability to work independently and as part of a dynamic team.

Tada the Game-Changer in Loyalty and Retention!

Who We Are?

Tada is a B2B2C loyalty and rewards platform that helps businesses improve channel partner, customer, and employee retention, build loyalty, and drive growth. Founded in 2012, Tada offers unified solutions that create engaging and rewarding experiences.

As an Indonesian SaaS company with a global footprint, Tada has assisted 400+ local and international brands across various industries. Our game-changing loyalty solutions have also garnered numerous awards, solidifying our reputation as a leader in the sector.

Job Opportunities

Job Title: Backend Engineer

Department: Engineering

Working Arrangement: On-site (client site)

Information about the role:

The ideal candidate will be responsible for delivering high-quality technical solutions, supporting ongoing system operations, and ensuring seamless project implementations.

Key Responsibility

  • Responsible to support and develop Node.js micro service modules and shared libraries to support core business functions
  • Ready to work on shifting time (weekend)
  • Responsible for system management, maintenance and enhancement
  • Monitoring, logging and create various alert on key matrix
  • Assist and guide others technically through collaboration and pair programming
  • Troubleshoot, identify and resolve advanced issues in a timely manner
  • Take full accountability of written and reviewed code, write reusable and sustainable code and practice test-driven development and defensive programming to create a more stable deliverable
  • Propose and deliver an optimal solution
  • Proactively ask for assistance when hindered by roadblocks or requirement issues
  • Documentation, Reporting and training

Requirement

  • Minimum 5 years experience in backend developer able to code in Nodejs or golang
  • Strong architecture and documentation skills along with experience working in a true agile environment with TDD and continuous integration
  • Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities.
  • Sufficient knowledge in application development, specifically developing robust and maintainable Nodejs or Vuejs apps
  • Strong Computer Science fundamentals in object-oriented design, algorithms, and data structures, as well as process-oriented problem-solving skills
  • Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical audiences
  • Detail-oriented with a demonstrated ability to self-motivate and follow through on project
  • Knowledge of containerization technologies such as Docker and container orchestration tools like Kubernetes.
  • Familiarity with cloud computing platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.

Why You'll Love Working Here?

  • Celebrate With Us: We love to celebrate work anniversaries and birthdays
  • Learning and lots of it. We promote vertical and lateral movement. It‚Äôs not uncommon for Tayo (that‚Äôs what we call our team) to move divisions two or three times throughout their career. We want people to learn new stuff that excites them.
  • Sincere teamwork. This word isn‚Äôt officially in our values, but when I asked new joiners about what value they really feel at Tada that‚Äôs not stated on our wall, many mentioned that Tayo is really helpful and they can feel the ‚Äòteamwork‚Äô atmosphere
  • Think and act like an owner is our value. But the truth is we don't want you to act like an owner, we want you to be a real owner. So for our top performers, we'd love to lure you into our stock options program

What We Do Not Promise

  • We do not promise fixed working hours. Sometimes, projects and deadlines may require additional hours or flexibility.

1. Design and implement mobile network optimizations for hotspot tethering on Android devices.

2. Develop and maintain network traffic management systems for efficient bandwidth distribution.

3. Work with Android‚Äôs TetheringManager API to enable automated tethering features.

4. Troubleshoot connectivity issues, NAT configurations, and mobile data sharing mechanisms.

5. Optimize network protocols (e.g., TCP/IP, LTE, 5G, Wi-Fi, VPNs) to enhance tethering stability.

6. Collaborate with backend developers to ensure seamless integration with BandShare‚Äôs ecosystem.

7. Research and implement workarounds for Android‚Äôs tethering restrictions where necessary.

Requirements

1. Experience with Android networking (TetheringManager, ConnectivityManager, NetworkMonitor).

2. Strong knowledge of Wi-Fi hotspot, USB, and Bluetooth tethering.

3. Familiarity with mobile carrier protocols (3G, 4G LTE, 5G, APNs, VPNs).

4. Understanding of NAT (Network Address Translation), DNS, and firewall configurations.

5. Ability to work with Linux networking tools (iptables, netfilter, iproute2).

6. Experience in network security (encryption, tunneling, firewall bypassing, etc.).

Preferred Skills

1. Experience working with Android Open Source Project (AOSP).

2. Knowledge of root-level system modifications for advanced tethering features.

3. Familiarity with decentralized networks and blockchain integration (for BandShare tokenization).

4. Ability to develop custom ROM/kernel optimizations for network enhancements.

Jsak News adalah perusahaan yang bergerak di bidang jurnalistik, aktif di Instagram dengan akun @jsaknews dan berbasis di Kota Yogyakarta. Dengan komitmen untuk memberikan informasi yang akurat dan relevan kepada masyarakat, kami terus berinovasi dalam menjaga kepercayaan publik. Karena itu, kami mencari kandidat yang memiliki keahlian dan pengalaman yang sesuai untuk mengisi posisi Database Specialist di Mantrijeron, Yogyakarta, DI Yogyakarta, Indonesia. Dengan bergabung dengan tim kami, Anda akan memiliki kesempatan untuk berkontribusi dalam pengembangan teknologi dan manajemen data yang mendukung operasional perusahaan.

Sebagai Database Specialist, Anda akan bertanggung jawab atas pengelolaan database yang mendukung operasional perusahaan, termasuk pengumpulan, penyimpanan, dan pemeliharaan data yang relevan untuk berbagai kebutuhan bisnis. Tugas-tugas utama Anda mencakup:

- Mengelola sistem database dengan menggunakan tools dan platform yang sesuai.

- Memastikan integritas dan keakuratan data melalui proses validasi dan audit.

- Membantu dalam pengambilan keputusan strategis dengan memanfaatkan data yang terorganisir dengan baik.

- Melakukan pelatihan dan pengembangan sistem untuk staf yang terkait.

- Mendukung proses pengambilan keputusan dengan laporan data yang efektif.

Untuk mengisi posisi ini, Anda harus memenuhi syarat berikut:

- Pendidikan minimal S1 dalam bidang terkait.

- Pengalaman kerja antara 1 hingga 3 tahun dalam bidang HR Consulting, HR Policies, HR Administration, HRIS Database Management, HR Information Management, dan Human Resource Development (HRD).

- Lokasi pekerjaan: Mantrijeron, Yogyakarta, DI Yogyakarta, Indonesia.

Job Overview:

We are looking for a proactive and technically skilled Network Security Engineer to manage and secure our organization's network infrastructure. In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring the stability and performance of the office network, troubleshooting network-related issues, and maintaining the security of the network to protect against potential threats. You will also be responsible for the ongoing support, monitoring, and optimization of network devices and systems within the office environment.

Key Responsibilities:

Network Maintenance & Troubleshooting: Manage the day-to-day operation of the office network infrastructure, including routers, switches, and wireless access points. Troubleshoot and resolve network-related issues quickly and effectively to minimize downtime.

Network Security Monitoring: Monitor the network for any security threats, unauthorized access, or unusual traffic. Apply patches, updates, and configurations to security devices to maintain a secure network environment.

Firewall & VPN Management: Configure and maintain firewalls, VPNs, and other network security devices. Ensure that secure connections are available for remote access and that internal network traffic is protected.

Incident Response & Resolution: Address and resolve network incidents, including performance degradation, outages, and potential security breaches. Work with the team to implement corrective actions and prevent future issues.

Network Optimization: Perform regular network performance assessments and make adjustments to optimize network speed, reliability, and security. Monitor bandwidth usage and adjust configurations as necessary to meet the demands of the office environment.

Configuration Management: Set up and configure network devices, including switches, routers, firewalls, and wireless access points. Maintain network diagrams, device configurations, and documentation.

Collaboration with IT Teams: Work with the internal IT team to troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues related to network hardware, software, and configurations.

Compliance & Best Practices: Ensure the network infrastructure adheres to security standards and compliance requirements. Document and enforce network security best practices to prevent vulnerabilities.

User Support: Provide support for end users with network-related issues, ensuring that issues are resolved in a timely manner to minimize business disruption.

Backup & Disaster Recovery: Assist in the development and implementation of backup and disaster recovery plans to protect network data in case of an incident.

Requirements:

Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Network Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).

Proven experience in network administration and support, specifically in troubleshooting network issues and optimizing network performance.

Strong knowledge of network protocols (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, etc.) and experience with network hardware (routers, switches, firewalls, etc.).

Experience managing network security tools, including firewalls (e.g., Cisco ASA, Palo Alto), VPNs, and intrusion detection/prevention systems (IDS/IPS).

Proficient in troubleshooting network issues (wired and wireless), including connectivity problems, network performance, and security incidents.

Knowledge of operating systems such as Windows, Linux, and macOS in the context of network troubleshooting.

Ability to diagnose network problems quickly, effectively, and with a focus on minimizing downtime.

Certifications (e.g., CompTIA Network+, Cisco CCNA, or equivalent) are preferred.

Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to think critically under pressure.

Good communication skills to effectively interact with team members, end users, and management regarding network issues and security threats.

PT DAPOER POESAT NOESANTARA GROUP adalah perusahaan dinamis dan inovatif yang beroperasi di berbagai sektor strategis, termasuk Telekomunikasi (Dapoer Telekomunikasi), Parfum (Dapoer Parfum), Fotografi (Dapoer Fotografi), Kimia (Dapoer Kimia), dan Pengembangan Web (Dapoer Website). Are you passionate about data science and eager to empower others with valuable skills?

At Algoritma, we‚Äôve been making data science accessible since 2017. Through corporate training, programming workshops, and data science bootcamps, we‚Äôve helped beginners and non-programmers achieve their career goals with a hands-on, learn-by-building approach.

We‚Äôre seeking Data Science Trainer and Instructors to join our team of dedicated professionals. In this role, you‚Äôll help students acquire industry-ready skills in R, Python, and SQL, contribute to innovative educational content, and support learners as they navigate their data science journey. You‚Äôll also have the opportunity to deepen your own expertise while making a meaningful impact on the lives of others.

At Algoritma, we believe education transforms lives. If you‚Äôre committed to lifelong learning and love teaching, this position offers a rewarding opportunity to grow and inspire.

The Role

  • Communication Skills: Ability to mentor and guide students effectively, fostering an engaging and supportive learning environment.

We are a leading AI company in Malaysia, providing analytics and machine learning services to help Enterprises be more data driven. We are looking for passionate, hardworking and talented software engineers to be part of our team in building innovative applications that customers love.

We are seeking a skilled Cloud Engineer with expertise in cloud infrastructure, container orchestration, and cloud migrations. This hybrid role is open to both fresh graduates with strong logical thinking skills and experienced professionals (senior roles available for candidates with 4+ years of experience). Join us to work on cloud migrations, leverage container technologies like ECS and EKS, and gain exposure to AWS native tools and Generative AI innovations!

Requirements (Persyaratan):

1. Keterampilan Pemrograman Go Lang yang Kuat:

Memiliki pemahaman mendalam tentang bahasa pemrograman Go Lang serta pengalaman yang solid dalam pengembangan perangkat lunak dengan Go.


2. Pemahaman yang Kuat tentang Konsep Pemrograman:

Memahami konsep dasar pemrograman seperti struktur data, algoritma, dan paradigma pemrograman untuk merancang solusi yang efisien.


3. Pengalaman dalam Pengembangan Perangkat Lunak:

Memiliki pengalaman yang relevan dalam mengembangkan perangkat lunak end-to-end, baik dalam proyek pribadi maupun profesional.


4. Kemampuan Analitis yang Baik:

Mampu menganalisis masalah kompleks, merancang solusi yang efisien, dan mengambil keputusan berdasarkan data.

5. Komunikasi dan Kolaborasi yang Efektif:

Kemampuan untuk berkomunikasi dengan jelas dan efektif serta bekerja dalam tim untuk mencapai tujuan bersama.


6. Pendidikan dan Sertifikasi yang Relevan:

Gelar sarjana atau diploma dalam Ilmu Komputer, Teknik Perangkat Lunak, atau bidang terkait. Sertifikasi atau pelatihan dalam Go Lang dapat menjadi nilai tambah.


7. Pemahaman Mendalam tentang PostgreSQL:

Memiliki pengetahuan yang kuat tentang konsep, fitur, dan operasi penting dalam database PostgreSQL.


8. Pengalaman dalam Pengelolaan Database:

Pengalaman praktis dalam merancang, mengimplementasikan, dan mengelola database PostgreSQL untuk aplikasi bisnis yang kompleks.


9. Kemampuan SQL yang Kuat:

Keahlian dalam menulis query SQL kompleks, membuat tata letak, dan mengoptimalkan kinerja query untuk database PostgreSQL.


10. Pemahaman tentang Model Data dan Desain Database:

Pemahaman yang baik tentang model data dan desain database yang efisien berdasarkan kebutuhan aplikasi.


11. Keahlian dalam Tuning dan Optimisasi Database:

Kemampuan untuk melakukan tuning kinerja, optimisasi query, mengelola indeks, dan mengoptimalkan parameter konfigurasi database PostgreSQL.


Responsibilities (Tanggung Jawab):


1. Pengembangan Aplikasi dengan Go Lang:

Merancang, mengembangkan, dan memelihara aplikasi menggunakan bahasa pemrograman Go Lang.


2. Implementasi dan Integrasi API:

Integrasi aplikasi dengan API eksternal dan layanan pihak ketiga menggunakan Go Lang.


3. Optimisasi Kode dan Performa:
Memastikan kode yang ditulis efisien, mudah dipelihara, dan dioptimalkan untuk performa tinggi.


4. Tingkatkan Keamanan Aplikasi:

Mengimplementasikan praktik keamanan terbaik untuk melindungi aplikasi dari potensi serangan cyber.


5. Kolaborasi dengan Tim:

Bekerja sama dengan tim pengembang, desainer, dan pemangku kepentingan untuk menghasilkan solusi perangkat lunak yang berkualitas.


6. Menerapkan Standar Kualitas dan Best Practices:

Mematuhi standar pengodean, melakukan pengujian yang tepat, dokumentasi, dan mentaati praktik pengembangan perangkat lunak terbaik.


7. Pembaruan Teknologi Terkini:

Tetap terkini dengan perkembangan terbaru dalam teknologi Go Lang dan memperbarui keterampilan sesuai kebutuhan proyek.

8. Pengelolaan Database PostgreSQL:

Merancang, mengelola, dan melakukan pemeliharaan database PostgreSQL untuk memastikan keandalan, kinerja, dan keamanan database.


9. Tuning Kinerja:

Melakukan tuning kinerja database dan query untuk memastikan kinerja optimal dan respon cepat dari sistem.


10. Keamanan Database:

Mengelola tingkat akses, mengatur kebijakan keamanan, dan melindungi data sensitif dalam database dari ancaman keamanan.


11. Pemulihan Bencana:

Mengembangkan dan mengimplementasikan strategi pemulihan bencana dan strategi backup yang tepat untuk memastikan kelangsungan bisnis di bawah kejadian darurat.


12. Migrasi dan Upgrade:

Merencanakan dan melaksanakan proses migrasi data serta upgrade database PostgreSQL ke versi terbaru sesuai dengan standar yang berlaku.


13. Pemeliharaan dan Monitoring:

Mengawasi kesehatan database, memantau kinerja, dan melakukan pemeliharaan rutin untuk memastikan operasi database yang lancar.

PERSYARATAN:

1. Minimal pendidikan D3/S1 di bidang Teknik Informatika, Sistem Informasi, Ilmu Komputer atau bidang terkait.

2. Berpengalaman di bidang IT minimal 1 tahun lebih diutamakan.

9. Kemampuan analisis dan problem solving yang baik.

10. Komunikatif dan mampu bekerja dalam tim maupun individu.

11. Disiplin, teliti dan memiliki kemampuan mulitasking.

12. Bersedia bekerja on-call jika diperlukan.

13. Memiliki sertifikasi IT (CompTIA, Cisco, Microsoft, dll) menjadi nilai tambah.

About Us

Since its inception, Arcstone has successfully delivered solutions to 200+innovative manufacturing companies globally. We are committed to finding and developing the best talents that will propel Arcstone forward. Arcstone is a digital manufacturing solutions provider helping run factory floors and interconnecting them to the global manufacturing supply chain. We welcome enterprise software development experts, manufacturing engineering talents, exceptional business developers, and other various roles who are ideally from the manufacturing sector. If you are ready to join a fast-paced, rapidly-growing company in a field poised for disruption, we want you!

Job Description

At Arcstone you will have the opportunity to work on several key software solutions that serve as a backbone for factories within a quickly evolving manufacturing and supply-chain industry. Our products are all B2B, so you will be speaking directly with clients and working with them in order to help deploy a full-fledged manufacturing execution system together with a supply chain integrated platform. Understanding our customer‚Äôs factory processes together with their supply chain operations is key to be able to configure out toolsets to help our customers improve their productivity, efficiency, transparency, and sustainability.

What is Amori?

Amori is transforming the dating landscape with its innovative AI-driven approach. Our app utilizes advanced AI technology to analyze text conversations, providing users with personalized dating insights and matchmaking recommendations. We're committed to helping individuals navigate the complexities of modern dating and find meaningful connections.

The problem we're solving

Here at Amori, we tackle the challenges modern daters face in finding genuine connections. By leveraging AI technology, we offer users personalized insights and recommendations tailored to their unique dating preferences and communication styles.

About the role

We're seeking a skilled React Native Mobile Developer to join our team remotely on a full-time basis. As a key member of our development team, you'll play a vital role in enhancing and expanding our cross-platform mobile application for both Android and iOS platforms. Must be able to communicate with team members in English.

Responsibilities include:

  • Lead end-to-end implementation of mobile app projects, from initial scoping to final delivery
  • Develop and maintain high-performance React Native code, adhering to best practices and architectural standards
  • Integrate seamlessly with backend systems to deliver a robust and scalable mobile experience

Why you should join Amori

Amori isn't just about dating; it's about revolutionizing the way people connect and build relationships. We're at the forefront of innovation in the dating industry, leveraging cutting-edge AI technology to provide users with unparalleled insights and recommendations. Join us on our mission to empower individuals to find love and meaningful connections in today's digital age.

What we're looking for

  • Minimum of 6 years of experience in mobile app development, with a focus on React Native
  • Proficiency in React Native for mobile application development
  • Strong understanding of JavaScript and TypeScript
  • Experience with Android and iOS development frameworks
  • Strong understanding in Redux with ability to use Redux without Redux Toolkit, and experience in integrating Redux Persist
  • Experience in implementing animation using React Native Reanimated
  • Experience building backend with NodeJS and SQL database integration
  • Familiarity with Git version control system
  • Knowledge of RESTful APIs and web services integration
  • Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills
  • Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a remote team environment
  • Passion for creating user-friendly and visually appealing mobile experiences
  • Must be able to communicate with team members in English

Bonus

  • Familiarity with web development using React and backend development concepts
  • Prior experience in the dating or social networking industry

If you're passionate about leveraging technology to improve the dating experience and want to be part of a dynamic team driving innovation in the industry, we'd love to hear from you!

Deskripsi Pekerjaan:

Kami mencari Radio Network Planning and Optimization (RNPO) Engineer yang berpengalaman untuk bergabung dengan tim kami. Kandidat akan bertanggung jawab atas perencanaan, pengoptimalan, dan pemeliharaan jaringan radio untuk memastikan performa jaringan yang optimal serta pengalaman pengguna yang berkualitas.

________________________________________

Tanggung Jawab Utama:

1. Perencanaan Jaringan Radio

‚Ä¢ Merancang dan merencanakan jaringan akses radio (2G, 3G, 4G, dan 5G) berdasarkan kebutuhan cakupan, kapasitas, dan kualitas.

‚Ä¢ Melakukan survei lokasi dan mengevaluasi calon site baru.

‚Ä¢ Melakukan perencanaan frekuensi, analisis spektrum, serta manajemen interferensi.

‚Ä¢ Menggunakan perangkat lunak perencanaan RF (Atoll, Planet, iBwave, dll.) untuk simulasi dan optimasi desain jaringan.

‚Ä¢ Memastikan kepatuhan terhadap regulasi spektrum dan kebijakan implementasi jaringan.

2. Optimasi Jaringan

‚Ä¢ Menganalisis KPI jaringan untuk mengidentifikasi dan menyelesaikan masalah performa.

‚Ä¢ Mengoptimalkan parameter jaringan (misalnya power level, antenna tilt, handover) untuk meningkatkan pengalaman pengguna.

‚Ä¢ Melakukan drive test dan analisis hasil menggunakan TEMS, Nemo, Accuver, atau alat lainnya.

‚Ä¢ Menangani permasalahan jaringan seperti call drop, throughput rendah, dan cakupan yang buruk.

‚Ä¢ Mengimplementasikan dan memverifikasi solusi optimasi seperti carrier aggregation dan beamforming (untuk 5G).

‚Ä¢ Berkoordinasi dengan tim jaringan inti, transmisi, dan IT untuk memastikan efisiensi end-to-end jaringan.

3. Manajemen Kapasitas dan Performa

‚Ä¢ Melakukan proyeksi pertumbuhan trafik dan merencanakan ekspansi kapasitas jaringan.

‚Ä¢ Mengevaluasi kebutuhan upgrade perangkat keras dan perangkat lunak untuk meningkatkan kapabilitas jaringan.

‚Ä¢ Mendukung implementasi teknologi baru seperti VoLTE, VoNR, dan MIMO.

4. Pelaporan dan Dokumentasi

‚Ä¢ Menyusun laporan mengenai performa jaringan, cakupan, dan hasil optimasi.

‚Ä¢ Memperbarui database perencanaan dan optimasi jaringan RF.

‚Ä¢ Memberikan rekomendasi kepada manajemen terkait strategi peningkatan jaringan.

________________________________________

Kualifikasi yang Dibutuhkan:

Keahlian Teknis:

‚Ä¢ Pemahaman mendalam tentang perencanaan RF, model propagasi, dan desain antena.

‚Ä¢ Pengalaman dalam menggunakan alat perencanaan dan optimasi RF (Atoll, Planet, TEMS, Nemo, dll.).

‚Ä¢ Memahami teknologi LTE, 5G NR, VoLTE, dan VoNR.

‚Ä¢ Kemampuan troubleshooting dan analisis performa jaringan.

Keterampilan Non-Teknis:

‚Ä¢ Kemampuan analitis dan pemecahan masalah yang baik.

‚Ä¢ Komunikasi yang efektif dan mampu bekerja dalam tim.

‚Ä¢ Mampu bekerja dalam tekanan dan memenuhi tenggat waktu.

‚Ä¢ Teliti, detail-oriented, dan memiliki pemikiran strategis.

Persyaratan Pengalaman dan Pendidikan:

‚Ä¢ Gelar S1 di bidang Teknik Telekomunikasi, Teknik Elektro, atau bidang terkait.

‚Ä¢ Pengalaman minimal 3 tahun dalam perencanaan dan optimasi jaringan radio.

‚Ä¢ Sertifikasi terkait RF Planning, LTE/5G, atau bidang sejenis merupakan nilai tambah.

‚Ä¢ Penempatan Balikpapan Kalimantan Timur, dan Jabodetabek
